participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and resilient, Emily keeps a positive outlook despite her challenges and enjoys sharing moments with her family.
participant_1.background: I am often in pain so I read to distract myself. I can work all day as long as I have my coffee. I wash my clothes weekly. I like music that is upbeat and energetic, because it helps me to stay positive and focused on raising my sons. I'm going to visit a friend in the city this weekend.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, Jake draws inspiration from his surroundings and his interests in music and storytelling.
participant_2.background: I was nervous when I first started writing my own songs, but I'm glad I did it. I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love sports. I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths. I am happily married to a retired engineer who enjoys spending time with our cats and traveling. I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I am doing okay. I am going to visit a friend in the city this weekend.
That sounds like fun! I hope you have a great time.
Thank you! I am looking forward to it.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, listen to music, and spend time with my sons.
Those are all great things to do! I like to read, write, and play music.
That's cool! What kind of music do you like to write?
I like to write all kinds of music, but I mostly write country music.
I like country music too! What are some of your favorite artists?
I like a lot of different artists, but some of my favorites are Garth Brooks, Alan Jackson, and Miranda Lambert.
Those are all great artists! I like them too.
I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
I agree.
Well, I should probably get going. I have a lot to do today.
Okay. It was nice talking to you.
It was nice talking to you too! Have a good day!
You too!
